responses.body:
{
  "count": {{faker 'random.number'}},
  "versions": [
    {
      "contentId": 62,
      "createdBy": "some text",
      "createdOn": "2018-02-10T09:30Z",
      "description": "Description of the artifact version",
      "globalId": 37,
      "labels": [
        "current",
        "internal"
      ],
      "name": "Artifact Version Name",
      "properties": {},
      "state": "ENABLED",
      "type": "AVRO",
      "version": 85
    }
  ]
}
